description: This script seeds the database with topics, skills, modules, lessons, and activities related to progressive skills in an educational platform. It ensures idempotent creation of hierarchical educational content.

methods.name: Subject _ensure_subject(db: Session, slug: str, title: str)
methods.description: Ensures a subject exists in the database, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: Skill _ensure_skill(db: Session, subject_id: int, subject_slug: str, level: str)
methods.description: Ensures a skill linked to a subject exists, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: Module _ensure_module(db: Session, subject_id: int, skill_id: int, skill_slug: str)
methods.description: Ensures a module linked to a skill exists, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: Lesson _ensure_lesson(db: Session, module_id: int, skill_slug: str)
methods.description: Ensures a lesson within a module exists, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: _ensure_activity(db: Session, lesson_id: int)
methods.description: Ensures an activity within a lesson exists, creating it if necessary.

methods.name: run()
methods.description: Main function that seeds the database with progressive skills data in an idempotent manner.

ctags.name: _ensure_lesson
ctags.pattern: /^def _ensure_lesson(db: Session, module_id: int, skill_slug: str) -> Lesson:$/

ctags.name: _ensure_module
ctags.pattern: /^def _ensure_module(db: Session, subject_id: int, skill_id: int, skill_slug: str) -> Module:$/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, subject_id: int, skill_id: int, skill_slug: str)

ctags.name: _ensure_skill
ctags.pattern: /^def _ensure_skill(db: Session, subject_id: int, subject_slug: str, level: str) -> Skill:$/
ctags.signature: (db: Session, subject_id: int, subject_slug: str, level: str)

ctags.name: _ensure_subject
ctags.pattern: /^def _ensure_subject(db: Session, slug: str, title: str) -> Subject:$/
